result.eng: He was a soldier during the war.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina shaighdiúir aimsir an chogaidh
result.orig: Bhí sé ina shaighdiúir aimsir an chogaidh

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ina ẛaiġdiúir aimsir an ċogaiḋHe was a soldier during the war.

result.eng: They left the country during the famine.
result.ga: D'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta
result.orig: D'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta
result.html: D'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghortaThey left the country during the famine.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad an tír aimsir an ġortaThey left the country during the famine.

result.eng: The weather was nice.
result.ga: Bhí an aimsir go deas
result.orig: Bhí an aimsir go deas
result.html: Bhí an aimsir go deasThe weather was nice.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an aimsir go deasThe weather was nice.

result.eng: How is the weather?
result.ga: Conas atá an aimsir
result.orig: Conas atá an aimsir
result.html: Conas atá an aimsirHow is the weather?

result.eng: What are your pastimes?

result.eng: I learned Esperanto as a hobby.
result.ga: D'fhoghlaim mé Esperanto mar chaitheamh aimsire

result.eng: From this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ga: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.orig: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach

result.ponchtml: Is ag dul i ndonaċt a ḃíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amaċFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.

result.eng: It is terrible weather.
result.ga: Is olc an aimsir í
result.orig: Is olc an aimsir í
result.html: Is olc an aimsir íIt is terrible weather.
result.ponchtml: Is olc an aimsir íIt is terrible weather.

result.eng: The weather is fine.
result.ga: Tá an aimsir go breá
result.orig: Tá an aimsir go breá
result.html: Tá an aimsir go breáThe weather is fine.
result.ponchtml: Tá an aimsir go breáThe weather is fine.

result.eng: The weather is awful.

result.eng: The weather is wonderful.

result.html: Tá an aimsir go hiontachThe weather is wonderful.

result.eng: It looks like rain.
result.ga: Tá cuma na báistí ar an aimsir

result.ga: Tá feabhas ar an aimsir
result.orig: Tá feabhas ar an aimsir
result.html: Tá feabhas ar an aimsirThe weather has improved.

result.eng: What's the weather like?

result.eng: How was the weather?
result.ga: Cén chaoi a raibh an aimsir

result.html: Cén chaoi a raibh an aimsirHow was the weather?
result.ponchtml: Cén ċaoi a raiḃ an aimsirHow was the weather?

result.eng: I am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ga: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.orig: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach

result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm aċ tá tuirse an doṁain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásaċI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ga: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.orig: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.html: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ponchtml: Inis dom faoin gcaiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat ó ċeann ceann na seaċtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.eng: What pastimes do you have in the winter?
result.ga: Cén caitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat sa ngeimhreadh
result.orig: Cén caitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat sa ngeimhreadh
result.html: Cén caitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat sa ngeimhreadhWhat pastimes do you have in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Cén caiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat sa ngeiṁreaḋWhat pastimes do you have in the winter?

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire

result.eng: It's a very boring pastime.
result.ga: Tá sé an-leadránach mar chaitheamh aimsire

result.html: Tá sé an-leadránach mar chaitheamh aimsireIt's a very boring pastime.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé an-leadránaċ mar ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireIt's a very boring pastime.

result.eng: I love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ga: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.orig: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.html: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maithI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a ḃíonn an aimsir go maiṫI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.

result.eng: It's not just the weather's fault.
result.ga: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.orig: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.html: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.
result.ponchtml: Ní hí an aimsir aṁáin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.

result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.orig: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair

result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
